title: Chocolate-stuffed prunes

default: 10 dried prunes, stones removed and incisions made lengthways
50g/1¾oz dark chocolate, cut into 10 equal pieces

steps: Stuff the 10 prunes with the 10 pieces of chocolate. Place onto a baking sheet and place into the oven to bake for six minutes, until warmed through.
Remove from the oven and serve on a warm plate.
